attributes.action: Make sure our troops in Afghanistan are properly equiped for the job they are doing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its about time that the Prime Minister and his government  acted to make sure that our boys and girls of the British armed forces have the right equipment to fight and defend themselves with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
